credit_line: Gift of Ruth Friedman in memory of Harry G. Friedman
dimensions: H x diam.: 14 x 8.5 cm (5 1/2 x 3 3/8 in.)
title: Vase
description: Dusty olive-green shoulder shading into soft tan and blue with branches of muted pale green leaves and peach and violet-blue berries; lower body violet. Straight sides tapering slightly outward toward base which curves abruptly inward but has no foot. Flat shoulder with suggestion of band where it joins body; large lipless mouth.
name: Vase
